fullDescription.intro: The node provides access to a set of database tables. It is configured by specifying a table and after execution the output port holds the chosen data table.
fullDescription.option:
A dropdown box lets you specify which of the following tables you want to import:
Agenzien (bacterial agents)
Matrices (food matrices)
GeschaetzteModelle (estimated models)
GeschaetzteParameter (estimated parameters)
Messwerte (data about bacterial concentration over time in a specified test condition)
Modellkatalog (model catalog)
ModellkatalogParameter (parameters in the model catalog)
Modell_Referenz (bibliographical reference for a model)
Versuchsbedingungen (test conditions)
DoubleKennzahlen (table connected to „Messwerte“, containing data about time, pH, aw, concentration)
GeschaetzteParameterCovCor (parameters about the quality of the estimated model)
Einheiten (units)
Literatur (bibliographical reference for test conditions)
GeschaetztesModell_Referenz (bibliographical reference for estimated models)
Sekundaermodelle_Primaermodelle (Primary models used to compute a secondary model)

ports.outPort: Data port holding the chosen data table.
